秉.definition: to grasp; to hold; to maintain

秉公辦理.definition: conducting business impartially (idiom); to act justly

秉承.definition: to take orders; to receive commands; to carry on (a tradition)

秉持.definition: to uphold; to hold fast to

秉燭.definition: variant of 炳燭|炳烛[bing3 zhu2]

秉筆.definition: to hold the pen; to do the actual writing
